title: DIP & DEVOUR
description: Where a little locket makes for a whole lot of trouble!Undercover FBI guy Jake Davidson . . . meet museum curating extraordinaire Kia Everet . . .Jake’s a chocolate charmer, and Kia’s decadence in a sundress. Too bad she doesn’t date the help, and worse that he’s here to catch her in the act. But it won’t be easy denying all that heat, chemistry, and desire. The food’s too good. The timing’s just right. And with a little loving push from a grandmother who’s a miracle in the kitchen . . .
author: Mary Kate Kopec
